You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tscy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&TScy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0426/index.htm U+00426].
  * `&tscy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0446/index.htm U+00446].
